languages.text: "Вы знакомы всего мгновение, а ты уже обрабатываешь новеньк{mf|ого|ую} своими проповедями. Впрочем, поговаривают, вы уже успели спеться... Ну здравствуй, {name}. Ты, выходит, теперь нам ровня?" {n}Каллигос Винтерскейл обозревает вас, словно любопытную диковинку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Вы знакомы всего мгновение, а ты уже обрабатываешь новеньк{mf|ого|ую} своими проповедями. Впрочем, поговаривают, вы уже успели спеться... Ну здравствуй, {name}. Ты, выходит, теперь нам ровня?" {n}Каллигос Винтерскейл обозревает вас, словно любопытную диковинку.{/n}

languages.text: "You've been acquainted but a moment and you're already getting to work on the new blood with your sermons. Then again, word is that you two are as thick as thieves already... Well, then, {name}, you are our equal now, is that it?" {n}Calligos Winterscale examines you as if you were a curio.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вы знакомы всего мгновение, а ты уже обрабатываешь новеньк{mf|ого|ую} своими проповедями. Впрочем, поговаривают, вы уже успели спеться... Ну здравствуй, {name}. Ты, выходит, теперь нам ровня?" {n}Каллигос Винтерскейл обозревает вас, словно любопытную диковинку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You two have known each other for one moment, and you're already conditioning the new blood with your sermons. Then again, word is that you are as thick as thieves already... Well, hello, {name}. So you are our equal now, is that it?" {n}Calligos Winterscale examines you as if you were a curio.{/n}

"You two have known each other for one moment, and you're already conditioning the new blood with your sermons. Then again, word is that you are as thick as thieves already... Well, hello, {name}. So you are our equal now, is that it?" {n}Calligos Winterscale examines you as if you were a curio.{/n}

"You've been acquainted but a moment and you're already getting to work on the new blood with your sermons. Then again, word is that you two are as thick as thieves already... Well, then, {name}, you are our equal now, is that it?" {n}Calligos Winterscale examines you as if you were a curio.{/n}

"You've been acquainted but a moment and you're already getting to work on the new blood with your sermons. Then again, word is that you two are as thick as thieves already... Well, then, {name}, you are our equal now, is that it?" {n}Calligos Winterscale examines you as if you were a curio.{/n}

"You've been acquainted but a moment and you're already getting to work on the new blood with your sermons. Then again, word is that you two are as thick as thieves already... Well, then, {name}, you are our equal now, is that it?" {n}Calligos Winterscale examines you as if you were a curio.{/n}

languages.text: 「ごく短期間で任務を熟知し、早速新しい風を吹き込んでいるな。一方で、噂によればお前たちふたりはもう親しい間柄になっているとか…だとすれば、{name}、お前は今や我らに並ぶ、ということでよろしいか？」{n}カリゴス・ウィンタースケールは骨董品でも扱うようにあなたを品定めする。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You've been acquainted but a moment and you're already getting to work on the new blood with your sermons. Then again, word is that you two are as thick as thieves already... Well, then, {name}, you are our equal now, is that it?" {n}Calligos Winterscale examines you as if you were a curio.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ごく短期間で任務を熟知し、早速新しい風を吹き込んでいるな。一方で、噂によればお前たちふたりはもう親しい間柄になっているとか…だとすれば、{name}、お前は今や我らに並ぶ、ということでよろしいか？」{n}カリゴス・ウィンタースケールは骨董品でも扱うようにあなたを品定めする。{/n}

languages.text: “怎么，还没认识多久，就已经开始用说教来毒害我们的年轻人了？不过，倒也有传言，说你俩早就串通一气、狼狈为奸了……话说回来，{name}，你现在倒和我们平起平坐了，是吧？”{n}卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔打量着你，仿佛你是件精美的古董。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You've been acquainted but a moment and you're already getting to work on the new blood with your sermons. Then again, word is that you two are as thick as thieves already... Well, then, {name}, you are our equal now, is that it?" {n}Calligos Winterscale examines you as if you were a curio.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “怎么，还没认识多久，就已经开始用说教来毒害我们的年轻人了？不过，倒也有传言，说你俩早就串通一气、狼狈为奸了……话说回来，{name}，你现在倒和我们平起平坐了，是吧？”{n}卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔打量着你，仿佛你是件精美的古董。{/n}

languages.text: «Solo se conocen desde hace un momento y ya sermonea a{mf|l| la} novat{mf|o|a}. Aunque también dicen que ya son íntim{mf|o|a}s amig{mf|o|a}s... Bueno, {name}, ahora está a nuestra altura, ¿no?». {n}Calligos Winterscale te examina como si fueras una pieza de museo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You've been acquainted but a moment and you're already getting to work on the new blood with your sermons. Then again, word is that you two are as thick as thieves already... Well, then, {name}, you are our equal now, is that it?" {n}Calligos Winterscale examines you as if you were a curio.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Solo se conocen desde hace un momento y ya sermonea a{mf|l| la} novat{mf|o|a}. Aunque también dicen que ya son íntim{mf|o|a}s amig{mf|o|a}s... Bueno, {name}, ahora está a nuestra altura, ¿no?». {n}Calligos Winterscale te examina como si fueras una pieza de museo.{/n}

languages.text: « {mf|Il|Elle} n'a même pas eu le temps s'habituer à son nouveau titre que vous lui servez déjà vos sermons. D'un autre côté, il paraît que vous vous entendez comme larrons en foire {mf|tous|toutes} les deux... Qu'importe. Alors comme ça, {name}, vous être désormais notre {mf|égal|égale} ? » {n}Calligos Winterscale vous observe comme si vous étiez un objet de curiosité.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You've been acquainted but a moment and you're already getting to work on the new blood with your sermons. Then again, word is that you two are as thick as thieves already... Well, then, {name}, you are our equal now, is that it?" {n}Calligos Winterscale examines you as if you were a curio.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Il|Elle} n'a même pas eu le temps s'habituer à son nouveau titre que vous lui servez déjà vos sermons. D'un autre côté, il paraît que vous vous entendez comme larrons en foire {mf|tous|toutes} les deux... Qu'importe. Alors comme ça, {name}, vous être désormais notre {mf|égal|égale} ? » {n}Calligos Winterscale vous observe comme si vous étiez un objet de curiosité.{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr kennt Euch gerade erst einen Augenblick, und schon muss das neue Blut eine Eurer Predigten ertragen. Andererseits wird gemunkelt, Ihr beide wärt bereits wie Pech und Schwefel ... Wie auch immer, {name}, wir sind ja nun gleichberechtigt, nicht wahr?" {n}Calligos Winterzunder mustert dich wie eine Kuriosität.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You've been acquainted but a moment and you're already getting to work on the new blood with your sermons. Then again, word is that you two are as thick as thieves already... Well, then, {name}, you are our equal now, is that it?" {n}Calligos Winterscale examines you as if you were a curio.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr kennt Euch gerade erst einen Augenblick, und schon muss das neue Blut eine Eurer Predigten ertragen. Andererseits wird gemunkelt, Ihr beide wärt bereits wie Pech und Schwefel ... Wie auch immer, {name}, wir sind ja nun gleichberechtigt, nicht wahr?" {n}Calligos Winterzunder mustert dich wie eine Kuriosität.{/n}

languages.text: "Daha tanışalı iki dakika olmadı ama vaazlarınla çömezin başını ağrıtmayı ihmal etmiyorsun bakıyorum. Gerçi aranızdan su sızmadığı söyleniyor ya... Artık bizdensin, dengimizsin, öyle mi {name}?" {n}Calligos Winterscale, seni bir antika gibi inceliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You've been acquainted but a moment and you're already getting to work on the new blood with your sermons. Then again, word is that you two are as thick as thieves already... Well, then, {name}, you are our equal now, is that it?" {n}Calligos Winterscale examines you as if you were a curio.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Daha tanışalı iki dakika olmadı ama vaazlarınla çömezin başını ağrıtmayı ihmal etmiyorsun bakıyorum. Gerçi aranızdan su sızmadığı söyleniyor ya... Eee {name}, demek artık sen de aramıza katıldın, öyle mi?" {n}Calligos Winterscale, seni bir antika gibi inceliyor.{/n}
